label: baru sa pergi
trs: later, after we have worshipped, maybe in the evening, and then I’ll go (there)’ [080918-001-CvNP.0016]\footnotetext{The original recording says kita i beribada selesay. Most likely the speaker wanted to say kita ibada selesay ‘after we have worshipped’ but cut himself off to replace ibada ‘worship’ with beribada ‘worship’.}
